translation.text: Airport & South Line, Bankstown Line, Blue Mountains Line, Central Coast & Newcastle Line, Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line, Inner West & Leppington Line, North Shore Line, Northern Line, South Coast Line, Southern Highlands Line, Western Line

With the current weather conditions affecting roads and public transport you are requested to avoid unneccesary travel through flood affected areas.

Please ensure you plan your trip before travelling.
Cumberland Line, Western Line - Partial Closure

Trains are suspended between Schofields and Richmond in both directions due to flooding. All services to Richmond will terminate at and commence from Schofields.

Replacement buses are operating two routes:
1. From Richmond to Schofields direct, in both directions and
2. Between Windsor, Riverstone and Schofields in both directions

Buses are unable to access Vineyard, Mulgrave, Clarendon and East Richmond Stations due to road closures in the area.

Please avoid any non-essential travel. If you must travel please allow plenty of additional travel time.

At this stage there is no forecast of when train services will return to normal.

Buses replacing trains between Wollongong and Dapto in both directions due to signal equipment repairs at Unanderra. 

Train services are running between Dapto and Kiama in both directions. 

Buses may supplement train services between Kiama and Bomaderry. 

Port Kembla services continue to operate. 

At this stage there is no forecast for the completion of repairs. Customers for the Airport will need to give plenty of notice to staff if they require assistance. 

Please allow additional travel time as delays will be experienced.
Central Coast & Newcastle Line - Partial Closure

Buses are replacing trains between Fassifern and Newcastle Interchange in both directions due to severe weather conditions causing flooding at Cockle Creek. Trains between Central and Fassifern will operate, some to an altered timetable.

We are currently conducting inspections in this area to determine when it can reopen safely
Please allow plenty of additional travel time.

Buses are replacing trains between Newcastle Interchange, Maitland and Scone/Dungog due to severe weather conditions causing flooding at Sandgate.

We are currently conducting inspections in this area to determine when it can reopen safely.
Please allow plenty of extra travel time
Flemington, Auburn, Clyde due to an operational issue at Redfern earlier.
Wolli Creek, International Airport, Domestic Airport, Mascot, Green Square due to signal equipment repairs at Ingleburn

Wollongong Buses are replacing trains between Wollongong and Dapto in both directions due to signal equipment repairs at Unanderra. 

A shuttle train service is operating between Dapto and Kiama in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.
Campbelltown due to signal equipment repairs at Ingleburn

A shuttle train service is operating between Dapto and Kiama in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.

The 5th carriage of this service has been locked off. Please board one of the other carriage of this service.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9847 8458.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1/2 is out of service. If you require assistance, please see staff or phone 9847 8459.
The lift between platform 2 and Bank Street is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9752 8460.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9851 7431.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone  9379 7702.
The lift between the concourse and bus bay E is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and bus bay D is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 4/5 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9563 7574.
The lift between the concourse and platform 2 is temporarily out of service. For assistance, please see station staff or call 9522 1224.
The lift between the concourse and Plough Inn Road is temporarily out of service. For assistance, ask staff or call 4629 0847.
The lift between the concourse and the northern carpark on Railway Terrace is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 9851 7244.
Station Update - Dapto, Kembla Grange, Unanderra and more

Buses are replacing trains between Wollongong and Dapto in both directions due to signal equipment repairs at Unanderra. 

Train services are running between Dapto and Kiama in both directions. Buses will supplement train services between Kiama and Bomaderry. Port Kembla services continue to operate. 

No forecast for restoration is available at this stage. Customers for the Airport will need to give plenty of notice to staff if they require assistance. 

Please allow additional travel time as delays will be experienced.
Please take extra care on the platform during platform renewal works and stand behind the yellow line on the platform prior to boarding your train.
Station Update - Vineyard, Clarendon, East Richmond and more

Due to local flooding buses are unable to access Vineyard, Mulgrave, Clarendon and East Richmond stations. 
Please avoid travelling in the affected areas.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959

From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 Light Rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works. 

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 to 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 to 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry. 

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

Buses are replacing trains between Fassifern and Newcastle Interchange due to severe weather conditions causing flooding at Cockle Creek.

Please allow additional travel time
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

Platforms 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works. A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
